00057 extern "C" {
00058 
00059     EGS_GTRANSFORMED_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00060         int error = 0;
00061         EGS_BaseGeometry *g = 0;
00062         EGS_Input *ij = input->takeInputItem("geometry",false);
00063         if (ij) {
00064             g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(ij);
00065             delete ij;
00066             if (!g) {
00067                 egsWarning("createGeometry(gtransformed): got a null pointer"
00068                            " as a geometry?\n");
00069                 return 0;
00070             }
00071         }
00072         if (!g) {
00073             string gname;
00074             int err = input->getInput("my geometry",gname);
00075             if (err) {
00076                 egsWarning(
00077                     "createGeometry(gtransformed): my geometry must be defined\n"
00078                     "  either inline or using 'my geometry = some_name'\n");
00079                 return 0;
00080             }
00081             g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gname);
00082             if (!g) {
00083                 egsWarning("createGeometry(gtransformed): no geometry named %s"
00084                            " is defined\n",gname.c_str());
00085                 return 0;
00086             }
00087         }
00088         g->ref();
00089         EGS_AffineTransform *t = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(input);
00090         EGS_BaseGeometry *result;
00091         if (!t) {
00092             egsWarning("createGeometry(gtransformed): null transformation."
00093                        " I hope you know what you are doing\n");
00094             result = new EGS_TransformedGeometry(g,EGS_AffineTransform());
00095         }
00096         else {
00097             if (t->isI()) egsWarning("createGeometry(gtransformed): "
00098                                          "unity transformation. I hope you know what you are doing\n");
00099             result = new EGS_TransformedGeometry(g,*t);
00100             delete t;
00101         }
00102         result->setName(input);
00103         result->setLabels(input);
00104         return result;
00105 
00106     }
00107 
00108 
00109     void EGS_TransformedGeometry::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00110 
00111         // label defined in the geometry being transformed
00112         g->getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00113 
00114         // label defined in self (transformation input block)
00115         EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00116 
00117     }
